availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James P. Threlkeld (Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Agnes N. Threlkeld. Father of Parmelia Threlkeld, James Threlkeld, Sarah Threlkeld, Robert Threlkeld, Martha Threlkeld, Jefferson Threlkeld, and Catherine Threlkeld. Farmer in Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Livingston County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Livingston, p. 359B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Division, p. 211.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Diershill Precinct No. 4, p. 211B.
Find A Grave, "James P. Threlkeld (Jan. 16, 1821-September 30, 1914)," Memorial #42270239, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42270239(accessed December 11, 2019).
